It would be funny if it weren't so sad. This wasn't my first revenge scheme, you know.

I sent my own son, Hector, after the ksharans. A vengeful shade got him, though a few other soldiers escaped.

You're already avenging my husband. Can you avenge my son as well?

Vengeance has concluded.

Let the grieving begin...
My son didn't deserve to die that way. I was a fool to send him into harm's way.
